		1 . Mumbai is a city that exemplifies India&rsquo;s aspirations  of becoming a financial competitor to China
	
		 
	
		2 .   Mumbai is a city that characterises or typifies India&rsquo;s expectation or dream  of becoming a financial competitor to China


	3 .  Mubai is a city that embodies or represents India&#39;s desires or wishes of becoming a financial competitor to China.
